news_header: At least 89 people are missing in eastern Spain after severe flooding.
news_text: Authorities in Valencia report that at least 89 people are still missing due to flooding in eastern Spain. This number only includes cases where families have provided information and biological samples for identification. The number of missing persons may increase as not all cases have been registered. The flooding, caused by heavy rains last week, has resulted in over 200 fatalities.
